programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: My Daughter Tried to Poison Me
programme.desc: Thomazina’s boyfriend died a year ago and she thinks her daughter, Destiney slept with him! She also suspects Destiney tried to poison her with bleach! In December, Chris and Jesse’s baby died and they blame Jesse’s mother!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Porn, Confessions, and Revenge Sex
programme.desc: Angelica says John "checks her" for signs of cheating every time she comes home. She wants a lie detector test to prove she's been faithful! Then, Ashley she found out that her boyfriend, TJ, had cheated on her when she was 8 months pregnant.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Wait! Don’t Read the Results Yet Steve…
programme.desc: Sharina thinks that Clarence is cheating on her because he’s always staying out late. Plus, Chrystal doesn’t want Earnie’s ex Tenyia to stay with them just because she’s the mother of his child. Is he also cheating on her?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Abusive Mom Takes Lie Detector Test
programme.desc: This mother is trying to regain custody of her daughter which she was convicted of abusing and neglecting. But Steve will not let her even get close to that child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Won't Beat Me Again
programme.desc: Taking a stand! After years of abuse and living in fear, Kristen finally thought she found the strength to leave her abusive relationship with Terrell behind. He openly admits to abusing Kristen and taking his rage out on her, but thinks he can change for the better. Changing a bad habit is never easy, but Steve may be the last hope this family has.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Did He Abuse My Son?
programme.desc: Heather is 17 years old and she says her boyfriend Anthony is the father of her child. But Anthony thinks his brother, Tracy is the father. Then, Roxana believes her two-year-old nephew was beaten by his mother Kyesha.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: He Beat Me In My Sleep/He Pulled A Gun On Me
programme.desc: Amber may not be the best mother, but her abusive boyfriend Alex is making their relationship and her son's upbringing, even worse. Then, David is desperate to get his kids back from ex-wife Fawn, who alleges David was an abusive father.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: He's Not Your Son
programme.desc: The laziest husband and wife lie about their child in order to get support from a woman who believes the child is her grandchild.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: If He Fails, This Stage Won't Be Enough
programme.desc: Police informed Latoya that her husband was accused of molesting her daughter. She immediately kicked him out, but feels torn. Then, Jesenia suspects her ex Melvin molested their daughter, but Melvin maintains his innocence!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: 5 Years of Abuse, Is He the Father?
programme.desc: Ashley’s boyfriend Tyjuan thinks his abuse is justified because he suspects her of cheating and doubts the paternity of their five kids! Then, Natasha gave birth two weeks ago, but fears that the father is her rapist and not her husband Daniel!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Young Mothers Accused of Abuse
programme.desc: Anthony believes his ex, Erica and her new boyfriend Jeremy are abusing his son. Next, Lacey is being accused, by her aunt, of physically abusing and neglecting her two young children.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Chose the Abuser over Your Kids
programme.desc: Jackie and her children live with a registered sex offender; accused of touching his own son, Ronnie takes a lie-detector test and demands a DNA test too.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Steve's Had Enough
programme.desc: At seventeen, Dimitrius has already had three children and now four additional women claim to be pregnant with his baby. Then Ethel and her daughters need Steve's help to right their wrongs and get their family back on track.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: My Big Brother Beats Me
programme.desc: A sisters nightmare ... 11-year-old Ana is terrified of older brother Ray who's regularly beat her since she was just five years old. Ana's fears have grown so much, she fears for her life every night when she goes to bed. While Ray is only 13, his on-stage behavior reveals his true colors, and shocks even Steve. With Ana's mother out of solutions, it's up to Steve and past guest Gary, to show Ray a better path in life and help Ana.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Bitter Ex or Concerned Mother?
programme.desc: Angela and James have separated after many years of marriage and she believes that James' new girlfriend has molested her daughters. Now she is demanding a lie detector test! Plus, Stevisha's husband Ira thinks she's cheating.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Dad, Did You Murder Our Mom?
programme.desc: After Juanita’s mother was murdered, things became strange, especially when her father Eric didn’t attend the funeral. She believes he was involved in the murder, but her sister Nora thinks she’s crazy. Can Steve help put this mystery to bed?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Do You Have A Gay Double Life?
programme.desc: After finding porn and several email and text exchanges with transsexuals, Quintiqua is demanding that her boyfriend prove if he is bi-sexual or not! Then, Herb dug up proof in the form of pictures of Carl and a woman named Deanna online.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Believe My Son!
programme.desc: Josephine's family was ripped apart after her boyfriend Mark was accused of molestation. Her son, Anthony and his girlfriend, Renee believe Mark molested their 2 year old son. But Mark believes that Renee coached her son to say this!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Your Kids Need Their Mom, But You Chose Him
programme.desc: A couple's children are taken away after the six-month-old nearly dies from having a baby wipe lodged in her windpipe; Shawn says his daughter came home with severe bruising on her body after staying with her mother and told him her mother beat her.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Steve Save My Daughter
programme.desc: With two small children at home, Anna's severe drug addiction has led her to prostituting to feed her habit. Her mother, who's had to raise the children, is terrified for her daughter's life.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: She Sold Her Baby for $23
programme.desc: Kandie was the guardian of Katie’s son who died at only 9 months. Katie thinks that Kandie was involved with his death, but Kandie claims she cared more for him than Katie did and even accuses her of selling him for $23 to her! Who’s responsible for the tragic death of the child?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Steve I Don't Trust Her
programme.desc: Dustin wants a baby with his wife Tessa, but he thinks she is taking birth control because she's been cheating. Then, Anthony says that he's been physically abusive to his fiancee Marie, because he believes that she's been cheating on him.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Want Him To Love Me
programme.desc: Mindy wants Michael to step up to the plate, be a father, and help support his child. His new girlfriend Tanya also wants Michael to be involved in his child's life, but after hearing the lie detector results, she too might question her man.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Want Him To Be The Father?
programme.desc: Ashley's mother is here because she says she's witnessed first hand Ashley's boyfriend Scott's abusive ways. She says that Scott has completely isolated Ashley and her grandchild from the rest of her family.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Seduced My Teenage Nanny
programme.desc: After Cassarah became Tim’s live-in nanny, they began a sexual relationship. Her family is livid over the 26 year age gap and claims that he takes her to swingers’ parties. Can Steve help Cassarah leave this dysfunctional relationship?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Explosive Lie Detector Results
programme.desc: Latoya is worried that her sister Tenielle’s boyfriend Ashley is molesting Tenielle’s 4 year old daughter! Latoya and the child’s father Antonio are here because they demand Ashley prove his innocence with a lie detector test!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Why Are You Dating A Child?
programme.desc: Sheila fears that her teen grand-daughter is having sex with a 26-year old family-friend. Then, Jaquella started dating her boyfriend Shaquille when he was a teen. Shaquille's mother is here to confront Jaquella for sleeping with her child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Is My Wife A Prostitute
programme.desc: Jesus is worried that Sonja is sleeping with other men in exchange for Cocaine. Then, Jessica is desperate to change Josh's controlling and abusive ways. She says she can no longer live with Josh if he's going to continue threatening her and accusing her of prostitution.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: My Son Said You Beat Him
programme.desc: Davonna believes that her husband Michael never abused her son. Her son told his dad Brandon that Michael punched him in the nose and back. Then, Evie wants to prove that she never abused her son and deserves custody of him from her mother!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: She's Not Pregnant, We Never Had Sex
programme.desc: Heather received a message from Alisha saying that she was pregnant with Remondo's baby but Remondo is Heathers boyfriend! Plus, Silvina and Clee'chaun have been in a relationship for almost 10 years and they've never met in person!
